txt.en: The trolls of Fornost are terrible foes, strong and vicious.

'Have you seen the big ol' trolls in Fornost? They be fearsome beasts. I took one look at them and ran back here as fast as my legs would carry me. Warn't my proudest moment.\n\n'You have a look about you as if you'd seen some fair battles. What do you think of a wager: If you can best any of them trolls, I'll offer you a right reward. If you don't, well, you'll get no mockery from me.'
Trolls can be found in Fornost, north of the Treasure Hunters' Camp.\n\nWill Widdup has challenged you to defeat a number of trolls within Fornost.
'You're much tougher than you look, [placeholder]! Well done, well done. You did what the rest of us could not.'
Will Widdup is at the Treasure Hunters' Camp in the north-western Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should return to Will Widdup and tell him of your success.
'The trolls are a terrible weapon of the Enemy...the fewer remain, the easier it will be to defend against Angmar.'
'Thank you again, [placeholder], for your aid against the trolls.'
'Greetings, friend. I am indebted to you for your aid.'
